About me

My name is Bruno Rodrigues and I am a second-year PhD candidate at the Bureau d’économie Théorique et Appliquée at the University of Strasbourg. My thesis advisor is Bertrand Kœbel and my co-advisor is François Laisney. You can find my CV here.

My thesis topic is about dynamic discrete choice models.
